title: Riot hates me
body:
So a few months ago there was a free Riot Kayle skin , but i already have it, so i must get another skin but i didn't ...
and the quiz with star guardian , i completed it in time like 100 times and there was an error i dont know why , i was logged... and i didn't get the icon
please help me

replies.body: Damn, sorry that we missed you! If you reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), we'll take a look and see what we can do.
